name: Team 1: Nugget Quest!
description:
Team 1 present to you NUGGET QUEST! An intense platformer, where one egg has to hunt nuggets. 

Explode with the power of the NON-STOP ACTION!  You will never play another game as exciting and exhilarating as Nugget Quest!

*More gameplay, story, mechanics, players, enemy will be added in the paid DLC*

Art by Ebony Vint

Coding by Jack Bestwick and Rebecca Davies

Tutorials Used

(1-3 in the series)
